DialogueText:
Could you be the one to craft me into the formation I was destined to asssume?
QUEST:Sculpt this marble into a statue worthy of the gods.

Could thou be the one to craft me into the formation I was destined to asssume?
QUEST:Buy the Sculpting Tools from the Town Shop!

Figure oOOoout hoOOow I died and I'll give yoOOOoou a key sOooo yoOooo can visit oooOOOur main installment behind that doooOOOor! QUEST:Defeat Board Monsters below until you find out how ghostie here died
Figure oOOoout hoOOow I died and I'll give yoOOOoou a key sOooo yoOooo can gooOooo behind that doooOOOor! QUEST:Defeat Board Monsters below until you find the 3 Bones then return

Hmm I do have an opening for a new Order Manager but that's a very demanding job! Prove to me that you'd be up to the task and I'll hire you.
QUEST:Craft some Empty Boxes from Anvil Tab 2

Hmm I do have an opening for a new Order Manager but that's a very demanding job! Prove to me that you'd be up to the task and I'll hire you.
QUEST:Craft 5 Empty Boxes from Anvil Tab 2
Hang on you aren't ready for a promotion. Come talk to me once you're level 10.
Hang on are you actually ready for a promotion? Come talk to me once you're level 10.
Now go to that forge and drag the ores into the 1st slot. Also drag the Oil Barrel I gave you into the 2nd slot. It'll speed things up. QUEST:Smelt a Copper Bar
Now go to that forge and drag the ores into the 1st slot. Also drag the Oil Barrel I gave you into the 2nd slot. It'll speed things up. QUEST:Smelt a Copper Bar at the Forge

Go mine some ores and read this while you do. Mining Efficiency is your main stat here. It is boosted by your STR stat as well as your Mining Power which comes from pickaxes and other equipment!
QUEST:Mine 2 Copper Ore

Go mine some ores and repeat after me. Mining Efficiency is boosted by STR and also Mining Power from pickaxes.
QUEST:Mine 2 Copper Ore.

Final task now. Go to the forge and but some permanent upgrades using your coins!
QUEST: Upgrade the forge 2 times

Final task now. Go to the forge and buy some permanent upgrades using your coins!
QUEST: Go to the Forge and buy 2 upgrades

Get past the Frogs and Beans and talk to the Leaf NPC they might know who stole the Town Gem!
QUEST:Get a scouting report from Stiltzcho the Leaf NPC in the slime map after beans!

Maybe he knows who stole the Town's Crystal?
QUEST:Complete Stiltzcho's Quests. Or just ignore him and keep going to the boss room!

I'll add a Hint to your codex if you want more info. Now go spend those pts!
MAIN QUEST:Spend 5 Talent Points

I'll add a Hint to your codex if you want more info. Now go spend those points!
MAIN QUEST:Spend 5 Talent Points

You need some ores to make better equiment...
MAIN QUEST:Go through the LEFT portal to start mining and do Glumlee's quests to get the Certificate!

You need more DEFENCE which you can get from crafting armor with ores!
MAIN QUEST:Go to the Left portal to start mining and do Glumlee's 3 quests!

Wait wait you're still a BEGINNER???
MAIN QUEST:Select a new class from Promotheus. He's in the Bean map it's after Frogs...

Wait forget the errands... you're still a BEGINNER???
MAIN QUEST:Select a new class from Promotheus. He's in the Bean map after Frogs!

Let's get you a better weapon those bare fists can only slap so hard! Try making some boxing gloves over at the anvil!
MAIN QUEST:Buy some Tape from the Shop and then make some gloves

Let's craft a weapon those bare fists can only slap so hard!
MAIN QUEST:Buy some Tape from the Shop and then make some gloves at the Anvil
